description:
The Strive 14 MN provides a super stable platform that excels across various terrains and snow conditions. Manual toe height adjustment allows for instant adjustments between different boot norms.

  • Low profile chassis for increased terrain feedback and power transmission
  • LDN Toe has an ultra-low center of gravity so skiers can feel the sensations of all terrain underfoot
  • 3-Part Heel absorbs vibrations while ensuring friction-free release when needed
  • 28mm range of adjustment
  • DIN settings of 5 to 14 offer a range wide enough for most aggressive skiers
name: Atomic Strive 14 MN Bindings With Brakes - Unisex
